description: Try our easy to follow Greek Style Pita Wraps recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Greek Style Pita Wraps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 900g Frozen Birds Eye Golden Crunch Chips - Straight Cut
425g Frozen Birds Eye Oven Bake Fish - Herb & Garlic Crumb

recipeInstructions.text: Place roma tomatoes on a baking paper lined tray, spray with oil and season to taste. Cook in a preheated oven at 220°C for 8-10 minutes. Remove and keep warm.

Cook desired amount of frozen Birds Eye Chips in the same oven at 220°C for 30-35 minutes. Place 2 frozen Birds Eye Fish fillets on a separate tray and cook with the chips for the last 15-18 minutes or until golden and crunchy.
Meanwhile, warm pita breads following packet directions. Spread with tzatziki and fill with lettuce and onion.
Cut fish in half lengthways and place on top of salad ingredients with tomatoes and chips. Season to taste. Roll up or serve as an open souvlaki.
